alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 24 at 8:02PM PST until February 25 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST SATURDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 19 inches. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph over some of the higher peaks, mainly until late tonight. * WHERE...Tehachapi, Grapevine and Frazier Mountain Communities. * WHEN... A Winter Storm Warning remains in effect until 4 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
